<html><head>
	<style type='text/css'>
		table.alert-table {
		  font-family:Arial,Sans-Serif;
		  font-size:8pt; 
		  }
		td.value-title{
		  background-color: silver;
		  font-size:10pt;
		  font-weight:bold;
		  }
		td.value-emphasized{
		  background-color: silver;
		  font-weight:bold;
		  }
		td.value-normal {
		  background-color: whitesmoke;
		  }
  
		td#first-column{
		  background-color: gainsboro;
		  }
	</style></head><body>
